programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Big Boys Gone Bananas!*
programme.desc: Para lançar um documentário que desvenda a implementação de agrotóxicos proibidos nas plantações de banana da América Central, dois cineastas terão de enfrentar a oposição de uma das maiores multinacionais agrícolas.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Maravilhosos perdedores: um mundo diferente
programme.desc: Por trás das equipas de elite do ciclismo mundial, há lutadores desconhecidos, verdadeiros heróis do ciclismo que caem, levantam-se e voltam. Uma odisséia que revela um olhar incomum sobre os “maravilhosos perdedores”, aqueles que sacrificam as suas carreiras profissionais pela glória dos seus companheiros de equipa.O que os motiva a continuar, a pedalar no absoluto anonimato, num dos desportos mais exigentes física e psicologicamente? Seguimos estes “Sancho Pança” do ciclismo profissional durante 7 anos e descobrimos a vida, até então invisível, destes homens, sem os quais as equipas profissionais ficariam sem pódio, nem troféu.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 1-2
programme.desc: Episódio 1 - Lanzarote | Episódio 2 - Fuerteventura

programme.title: Barcelona: Surf Destination
programme.desc: Em "Barcelona: Surf Destination", Ítalo Ferreira, o primeiro campeão olímpico de surf, aceita o convite do seu amigo Alex Vilalta e viaja para Barcelona para explorar a costa catalã e conhecer a comunidade de surfistas que mantém o espírito do surf aceso neste reduto mediterrâneo. Neste documentário de aventuras repletas de sol, somos convidados a partir numas férias com amigos que se reúnem para tagarelar e entregar-se àquilo que os apaixona: o surf.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: In The Turn
programme.desc: “In The Turn”. Always forward and never straight. At the age of three, Crystal said that she was a girl despite being born in a boy's body. Ever since her mother bought her a skirt shortly after, a difficult journey began for Crystal, whose transition has since suffered all kinds of harassment that at the age of five led her to consider taking her own life. The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: The Fabulist
programme.desc: Neste documentário inspirador e caloroso, Sandi Marx, uma agente de talentos veterana de Hollywood decide iniciar uma nova carreira como humorista de stand-up, agora que se confronta com o declínio da saúde.

programme.title: Vamos lá, submundo!
programme.desc: Numa região sob tensão, os artistas árabes do Médio Oriente lutam para se exprimirem livremente e para promoverem atitudes mais liberais. Yallah! Underground acompanha alguns dos artistas árabes contemporâneos mais importantes e progressivos do submundo ao longo dos anos de transformação, de 2009 a 2013.

programme.title: Socorro Evolution
programme.desc: Uma equipa de embaixadores da vida natural marinha prepara-se para uma grande aventura do arquipélago de Revillagigedo do México, Património da UNESCO. Os mergulhadores de renome internacional mostram-nos a beleza da forma como os homens pode explorar a vida marinha ao mesmo tempo que a conservam.

programme.title: 265 Days Without Waves (265 dias sem ondas)
programme.desc: Uma história única e extraordinária sobre a criação por um grupo de surfistas locais de uma comunidade e cultura de surf apesar das limitações, numa costa que mal chega aos 100 dias de ondas por ano. Através das personagens, exploramos a evolução do surf bem como a exponencial mudança socioeconómica de Barcelona e arredores, da década de 1960 até à atualidade. Entre os protagonistas aventureiros e dedicados, conhecemos os pioneiros que nadaram contra a maré e a nova geração que vive e respira o surf de uma forma completamente diferente. Frustração, espera e desespero combinam-se em igual medida com entusiasmo, perseverança e humor.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Cor - Futuro
programme.desc: Os toucadores do Makeup Stars são tomados pela cor, com os concorrentes a enfrentar o primeiro desafio com a técnica de caracterização. Seguirão as instruções da maquilhadora Anna Cartés, especialista na técnica das perucas e em apagar as feições dos modelos para criar novas personagens. Agoney, um cantor camaleónico e fã da maquilhagem, visitará o programa para dar conselhos aos concorrentes. Quem será a ""Super Estrela"" e ganhará privilégios para o próximo episódio? Quem terá a pontuação mais baixa? Não percas uma explosão de cor.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: Ettore Bassi: Stage and Race
programme.desc: O ator italiano Ettore Bassi é conhecido pelo seu trabalho no cinema, televisão e teatro. Mas nem todos sabem que também é um piloto profissional de corridas de rampa. A sua vida divide-se com frequência entre as duas paixões e dois cenários muito diferentes: o palco ou a pista. Em 2022, as duas realidades chocam quando tem agendados um espetáculo e uma corrida, em lados opostos da Itália. Bassi decide dedicar-se aos dois projetos, sabendo que o sucesso é quase impossível. A sua escolha e determinação revelam muito acerca do homem e do seu passado...

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora da Bundesliga e jogadora do AC Milan Julia Simic parte de Nuremberga para apanhar Dafina Redzepi (TSG Hoffenheim) e visitar Bärbel Wohlleben, que tem a honra de ter sido a primeira mulher que marcou um Golo do Mês da ARD Sportschau. Julia mostra-nos o campo de futebol que criou para que as raparigas possam começar a jogar, enquanto Bärbel recorda os seus anos de infância e o modo como a federação alemã de futebol (DFB) baniu as mulheres da prática do futebol profissional. As três irão jogar nas margens do Reno enquanto conversam sobre a paixão que partilham pelo futebol.

programme.title: Andrés Iniesta, O Herói Inesperado
programme.desc: Esta é a história de uma pessoa normal que faz coisas extraordinárias. Alguém que persegue e conquista triunfos cuidando dos pequenos detalhes, porque estes são, afinal, os que fazem dele um futebolista diferente. Todos conhecemos Iniesta, o mágico da bola que conquistou dois triples campeonatos com o Barça e levantou a Copa do Mundo com a seleção espanhola. E sim, é claro que conhecemos os seus grandes momentos desportivos. Mas quem está por trás dessa estrela mundial do desporto?

programme.title: Bojan, por trás do sorriso
programme.desc: Depois de retirar-se dos relvados aos 32 anos, Bojan Krkic decide contar a sua história. Através de uma conversa com o psicanalista que o tratou quando da sua estreia com o FC Barcelona aos 16 anos, o documentário explora as dificuldades enfrentadas por um talento precoce e sensível no mundo cruel do futebol. Jogadores que testemunharam a sua carreira de perto, tais como Thierry Henry, Andrés Iniesta e Zlatan Ibrahimovic, partilham o seu ponto de vista sobre Bojan, o futebolista, e Bojan, a pessoa, e refletem sobre a pressão, saúde mental e gestão de expetativas.

programme.title: The Dreamed ones
programme.desc: Mais de cinco décadas depois, dois atores fazem uma leitura dramatizada das cartas que os poetas Anja Plaschg e Laurence Rupp trocaram durante o seu fascinante relacionamento.

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal é uma história sobre vontade, sonhos, determinação, fé, rebelião, coragem e amor. O filme convida-nos a uma jornada pelos diferentes mundos e altamente variados de Sadio - desde a vida rural numa pequena aldeia no extremo sul de Senegal até aos holofotes do futebol mundial jogando pelo Liverpool FC, vencendo as Ligas dos Campeões como número 10 e ganhando a audiência mundial. A Interação de animações, cenas de documentário, um conjunto diversificado de imagens detalhadas e de arquivo dá vida ao passado de Sadio e cria um excitante enredo cheio de emoções.

programme.title: SEVE - Artista, Lutador, Lenda
programme.desc: Seve continua a ser uma lenda, um campeão multi-major, o homem responsável por fazer da moderna Ryder Cup um grande acontecimento. A sua paixão pelo golfe era tal que ainda criança esgueirava no campo para jogar à noite, futuramente faria o mesmo num esforço "para encontrar a magia". A sua história é contada por membros da sua família e do seu círculo interno, por outros grandes desportistas e através do material recentemente descoberto. É um conto hipnotizante de talento, crença e bravura - a história da vida de Seve… e da sua morte.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 5-6
programme.desc: Episódio 5 - La Palma | Episódio 6 - El Hierro and La Gomera

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: The Fabulist
programme.desc: Neste documentário inspirador e caloroso, Sandi Marx, uma agente de talentos veterana de Hollywood decide iniciar uma nova carreira como humorista de stand-up, agora que se confronta com o declínio da saúde.

programme.title: Coisas bonitas
programme.desc: Beautiful Things é uma viagem ao nosso consumo obsessivo. Os muitos objetos que acumulamos e que acreditamos serem essenciais começam sua jornada de produção em locais industriais e científicos isolados e silenciosos.

programme.title: Overdosed
programme.desc: O inquietante turbilhão da mortífera crise dos opiácios nos EUA é revelado na pequena cidade rural de Petersburg, West Virginia, o estado mais duramente afetado por esta epidemia.

programme.title: In The Turn
programme.desc: “In The Turn”. Always forward and never straight. At the age of three, Crystal said that she was a girl despite being born in a boy's body. Ever since her mother bought her a skirt shortly after, a difficult journey began for Crystal, whose transition has since suffered all kinds of harassment that at the age of five led her to consider taking her own life. The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: Fast Forward - Episode 1 - 5
programme.desc: Fusão Nuclear | Corpos Biónicos | Limpadores do Espaço | Carne Criada em Laboratório | Blockchain, protocolo da confiança

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 3-4
programme.desc: Episódio 3 - Gran Canaria | Episódio 4 - Tenerife

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: A minha Decisão, por Andrés Iniesta
programme.desc: "São poucas as pessoas que sabem o que aconteceu quando me lesionei. Poucas sabem que tive de tomar uma decisão de enorme importância. Valia a pena continuar a jogar, ou estava na altura de parar?" Um documentário revelador sobre o lendário médio, Andrés Iniesta, quando enfrenta uma decisão crucial após uma lesão que ameaça a sua carreira. A história de um amor de longa data pelo futebol, sob a ameaça de uma situação cruel e inevitável.

programme.title: Episódios 7-8
programme.desc: A Tormenta de 18 Dias | Um Novo Começo

programme.title: The Australian Dream (2019)
programme.desc: O Australian Dream é um documentário que utiliza a notável e inspiradora história do legendário aborígene da AFL Adam Goodes como o prisma para contar uma história mais profunda e poderosa sobre raça, identidade e pertença. O filme irá descompactar os eventos das temporadas da AFL 2013-15 e fará perguntas fundamentais sobre a natureza do racismo e da discriminação na sociedade atual. O escritor premiado de Walkley, Stan Grant, e o premiado diretor do BAFTA, Daniel Gordon, unem forças para contar essa história notável de um dos jogadores mais condecorados e célebres da história da AFL.

programme.title: Rumeysa: De cabeça erguida
programme.desc: Com 2,15 m de altura, a impressionante estatura de Rumeysa Gelgi é apenas comparável à sua assombrosa força interior. Rumeysa Gelgi nasceu com uma mutação genética rara, a síndrome de Weaver. E a vida não tem sido fácil para a mulher mais alta do mundo. Agora, graças a uma cirurgia que lhe mudou a vida, está pronta a viajar pela primeira vez aos EUA para conhecer algumas das mulheres mais inspiradoras do mundo. Na sua viagem de autodescoberta, Rumeysa contará a sua história e aprenderá junto com outras mulheres que detêm recordes do Livro Guiness.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, vencedora da UEFA em sete ocasiões e Jogadora do Ano de 2018 da FIFA, aguarda a chegada de Annie Fortems, uma pioneira do futebol feminino francês, e Sonia Ouchene, uma jovem e promissora jogadora do Stade de Reims, no estádio Olympique Lyonnais. Wendie recorda o início da sua carreira, as suas vitórias e momentos difíceis, como os ataques racistas que sofreu. Annie discorre sobre como a sua geração tornou o futebol feminino francês possível, apesar das ameaças de morte recebidas, enquanto Sonia fala sem rodeios sobre a disparidade salarial entre o futebol feminino e masculino. O encontro das três jogadoras será marcado pela admiração mútua.

programme.title: Ride your Dream
programme.desc: Motociclismo era um mundo de homens, até agora. Este documentário apresenta-nos a Ana Carrasco, a piloto espanhola que revolucionou o mundo das duas rodas e que, desde cedo, teve um sonho claro: ser campeã mundial. Por meio de conversas íntimas com a sua familia e equipa, conhecemos as motivações de Ana, os obstáculos que enfrentou e os sonhos que continua a perseguir. A sua carreira, desde as suas origens numa pequena cidade em Murcia a ser a primeira mulher a vencer um Campeonato do Mundo, é fonte de inspiração para qualquer pessoa.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Piemonte cuisine is influenced by its mountainous terrain. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us how to make its warm regional dishes like Bagna Cauda.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini prepares traditional dishes from the Northern Italian region, Lombardy.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Home to popular Italian dishes like Tiramisu, Chef Michael Bonacini explores cuisine from Italy's Veneto region.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini cooks up classic dishes like Mint Fava Bean Soup and Amaretti Cake from the well-known Lazio region of Italy.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Charming host Michael Bonacini inspires us to make simple, flavourful dishes from the rustic Italian region, Umbria.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Host Vijaya Selvaraju makes delectable Indian dishes using versatile Indian spices and flavours.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Layers of Thai Flavour
programme.desc: Thai host Palin Congchitnant uses fresh Thai ingredients and flavours to make Smoked Trout Salad and a Kaffir Lime Vodka Martini.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Barbeque is a go-to cooking method in many cultures. Host Natalia Machado grills up delicious Argentinian barbeque favourites like Empanadas.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Sauce is king in Italian cuisine! Warm host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shows us how to cook three simple Italian sauces.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Miso is an extremely common ingredient in Japanese cuisine. Host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us how miso can add flavour and richness to any dish.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Charming host Vijaya Selvaraju demystifies a number of Indian dishes like Dal Soup in a crockpot and Fish in (three-ingredient) Red Chili Chutney.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: It's all about the sauces as Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how easy and versatile they are in Thai cuisine.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Three Course Argentinian Meal
programme.desc: Warm host Natalia Machado makes a three course Argentinian meal that reminds her of her family.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Stuffed Olives and Risotto
programme.desc: Italian host Vanessa Gianfrancesco whips up classy dishes for a gorgeous dinner party in Italy.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Every culture has its version of finger food and in Japan it’s called Izakaya! Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen prepares tapas dishes perfect for nighttime snacking.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: The key ingredient in this episode of One World Kitchen is mangoes! Host Vijaya Selvaraju uses mangoes for some classic Indian dishes.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Endearing host Pailin Chongchinant makes three popular Thai dishes: Coconut Chicken Soup, Green Papaya Salad, and the most famous, Pad Thai.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Wild Rice and Walnuts
programme.desc: In this "W" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas takes on wild rice and walnuts, making pancakes and walnut pate, then must combine the flavours in one dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Figs and fennel? In this "F" challenge, Chef Robert Jewell makes fig tarts and sweet clams in fennel broth and then unites his two ingredients.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this fun “C” challenge, Chef Leah Wildman makes dishes incorporating the satisfying flavours of cheddar cheese and chestnuts.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chef Lauran Gulyas' knowledge of lemon and lentils is tested as she uses the two ingredients in separate dishes and in one remarkable combination.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: The challenge? Eggs and Espresso. Chef Robert Jewell makes carbonara sauce, espresso sauce and then creates an unexpected dish featuring both flavours

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Explore heat and sweet as Chef Leah Wildman works with honey and habanero on their own and in a fun final mashup of the two flavours.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chef Lauren Gulyas exercises her creativity with salmon cakes, strawberries and biscuits, and a mind-blowing final strawberry and salmon combo dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell gets creative to meet the "P" challenge posed by prawns and pistachios with prosciutto-wrapped prawns and pistachio brittle.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Watch Chef Leah Wildman as she faces the challenge posed by duck and dates. She makes dishes with each, then combines them for a delicious surprise.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chef Lauren Gulyas tests her imagination with cashews and carrots. First, she makes cashew chicken and carrot cupcakes. But how will she combine them?

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this "C" challenge, Chef Robert Jewell shows us what he can do with cauliflower and cranberries - on their own, and in one unconventional dish.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clam, Risotto, Potatoes, and Salmon
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, clams and artichoke! Next, radicchio risotto. Followed by an Arabic twist on baked potatoes! Finishing with a BC roasted salmon!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pancakes, Lobster Soup, Duck, and Flan
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, wild rice pancakes! Next, lobster-lime soup! Followed by a Tuscan porchetta-style duck! Finishing with a flan with port-soaked cherries!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Tart, Tuna, Carbonara, and Claufoutis
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, a mushroom-brie tart! Next, tuna with grilled fennel-kale! Followed by classic spaghetti Carbonara! Finishing with a berry clafoutis!

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of sardines and caponata on crostini, chicken legs with sausage and peppers, pecorino smashed potatoes, and fennel and orange salad.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of grilled asparagus with a 63 degree egg, farro succotash, sous-vide pork tenderloin with blueberry sauce, and a no bake blueberry cheesecake.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of braised oxtail and plantain waffles, Turkish eggs with spiced yogurt, grilled broccolini, and plum parfait with gluten-free granola.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: It's all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on bitter sauces! First up, a duo of chimichurris - one with black garlic! Next, a stout and espresso gravy for lamb and a traditional Georgian walnut sauce!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on fatty sauces! First up, patatas bravas with aioli and brava sauce! Next, classic sauce choron on crab cakes and a duck fat-blood orange emulsion with duck confit!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on creamy sauces! First a duo of creamy butter sauces with salmon! Next up a sauce créme with beef tenderloin and a vegan coconut créme anglaise!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on savoury sauces! First up, a soy-miso-honey sauce for seared duck breast! Next, a black demi-glace for hanger steak and a sauce duxelles for scallops!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? That's right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencer's Grilled Chicken Molé. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts' favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 The Art of Wood
programme.desc: It's time to celebrate the art of smoking with wood! You'll drool over Spencer's Cherrywood Smoked Chicken Wings, dry rubbed with his favourite spices and smoked with cherrywood. Next, Spencer marinates sable fish in Japanese ingredients and grills it on a sweet-smoky cedar plank. Then, Spencer shows off his Texas BBQ skills with his Mesquite Smoked Skirt Steak. Engulfed in a thick cloud of white smoke, this skirt steak has the flavour and texture of tasty brisket, but made in a fraction amount of time. Finally, Spencer gives a pork shoulder a long, smoky cook in oak wood. The wait is worth it as he serves it piled high on a bun and topped with a mustardy Carolina BBQ sauce.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill

programme.desc: Grill master Spencer Watts shows us four ways to barbeque a classic. Succulent, tender, mouth-watering ribs.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Warm and talented Cantonese home cook Mary Tang kick starts this One World Kitchen 3 episode by show- casing traditional, evERS-popular dim-sum dishes. First up, juicy Pork-Filled Dumplings! Made with fresh watERS-chest- nuts, shiitake mushrooms and a blend of Asian sauces and spices, these sweet and salty bite-sized creations are to die for! To add to our desire, Mary fries up some savoury Chinese Daikon Radish Cakes in a piping hot wok. Next, a flavourful lotus leaf filled with sticky rice and a medley of salted duck eggs, Shaoxing wine, and dried shrimp is truly hard to resist! To finish off, Mary combines gorgeous Adzuki beans with rice flour and sesame seeds to create airy and full...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sautéed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork p'té pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: We take a '76 Cadillac Hearse and start turning it into a torque monster that will scream down the track starting with the drivetrain.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: We get our hands on Ford's new 7.3 liter pushrod V-8 Godzilla engine and see how it stacks up against the other BIG 3 swap engines. After doing a baseline test, we'll make some modifications by throwing the Engine Power touch on it and see what this beast lays down in the dyno cell.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: We'll show you the step-by-step inner workings of an Allison transmission when our guys build the gearbox for a Sierra HD Duramax.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: We upgrade the brakes, repair underside problems, and put some great new off-road and recovery mods on our 2007 Jeep Wrangler JK. Then we'll take it out for a wheeling adventure.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Our '69 Road Runner, nicknamed Road Burner, gets a big bump in power when we perform a Gen III Hemi engine swap.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra, in this episode visits Dubrovnik, where she explores a war museum, and explores the dramatic monuments, mesmerising landscapes and indulges in water sports.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a traditional Awadhi korma to Rewa’s famous Mutton Bandhwesh, Alex explores the vast and complex culinary culture of India’s royal kitchens.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alex continues her journey in Croatia, exploring Brac and Spilit. Starting with quad biking and windsurfing in the coastal town of Barc, she later explores the port city of Split with is beauty.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Parathas may have originated in Peshawar but they have now become one of the most popular dishes

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Explore the beautiful Dalmatian coast with a little history of Split with Alex and stay tuned as next she explores the port city of Salona.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex uncovers the secret behind the irresistible Shahi Dal at Amritsar’s iconic eating joint, Kesar Da Dhaba.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Watch a musical instrument powered by sea waves and learn how glassware was made in Roman era. This and more with Alexandra in Zadar episode.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: The cuisine of Punjab is rich in flavour because it is farm-to-fork and still employs traditional cooking methods such as cooking in a charcoal oven.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 World Heritage Portugal, Portugal
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Alexandra in this episode explores Plitvice, where she visits a national park, interacts with locals, tastes local wine and then leaves for Zagreb.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex Outhwaite meets a Nawab in Lucknow, who shows her how to make Gosht Mawazad, a decadent Awadhi dish with mutton and dry fruits.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 World Spas Chiva Som, Thailand
programme.desc: From an underwater therapy to a massage that detoxes internal organs, Jamie Srubis tries varied spa treatments at the Chiva Som resort in Thailand.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: On a short break in Belfast, the capital of Northern Ireland, Olivia, an avid traveller, finds herself infected by the energy of the city at a traditional Victorian market. At the city’s main attractions like Belfast City Hall and Belfast Castle, she gets to know its history. She also visits the Ulster Museum, which tells her stories about the Egyptians in Ireland, and Titanic Belfast, which makes the grand ship and its downfall come alive for her.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From a traditional Awadhi korma to Rewa’s famous Mutton Bandhwesh, Alex explores the vast and complex culinary culture of India’s royal kitchens.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.desc: Alex uncovers the secret behind the irresistible Shahi Dal at Amritsar’s iconic eating joint, Kesar Da Dhaba.

programme.desc: Watch a musical instrument powered by sea waves and learn how glassware was made in Roman era. This and more with Alexandra in Zadar episode.

During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 World Heritage Portugal, Portugal
programme.desc: From the impact of maritime trade and the European Renaissance on Portugal in the 15th century to the nationwide Romanticism movement in the 19th century, the heritage sites of Portugal such as Jeronimo Monastery and Pena Palace reveal various stages of the country’s evolution.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. programme.title: Behind the Scenes of A2RL’s Autonomous Racing
programme.desc: We've gone over how A2RL's autonomous cars work (if you haven't seen our previous video, check it out below), but what happened when the cars finally hit the track to race? From 8 cars running in qualifying, to racing against ex-F1 driver Daniil Kyvat, to the final 4-car race, the cars were certainly put through their paces. We sent Alex Goy to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to see just how A2RL's autonomous cars got on at their first major event.

programme.title: FIA Karting
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E06 FIA Karting: Round 6: Kartodromo Val Vibrata
programme.desc: The final stages of the second and last round of the Mondokart.com FIA Karting European Championship - KZ, KZ2 & KZ2 Masters were the scene of some exciting racing with its share of surprises. David Trefilov (DEU) won the KZ Final, while Lorenzo Travisanutto (ITA) was crowned champion, Maksim Orlov took victory in KZ2 ahead of new champion Matteo Spirgel (FRA), while Riccardo Nalon (ITA) won the KZ2 Masters title.

programme.title: BTCC
programme.sub-title: S00 : E08 On The Limit S4 E8 | Uncharted Grounds | BTCC 2023
programme.desc: After a torrid few rounds, our drivers' fortunes finally turn as they venture to the BTCC's new circuit...

programme.title: E-Xplorer FIM World Cup
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E02 E-Xplorer FIM World Cup // Oslo, Norway // Episode 2
programme.desc: Bonnell Racing’s Tanja Schlosser and Dylan Woodcock saw off tough competition to win Round 2 of the FIM E-Xplorer World Cup in Oslo.

programme.title: A2RL Explained - Extreme Engineering On Track
programme.desc: We've seen autonomous racing try to take off before, but A2RL, the Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League, is set to push the boundaries of what autonomous racing really can be. We sent Alex Goy over to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to find out what clever tech powers the cars, how they manage to compete in various challengers without a driver (including overtaking, fastest lap and even a man vs machine challenge), and why A2RL is relevant to today's society.

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.desc: The second staging of X-Trial Chalon-Sur-Saône and the first in two years in front of a packed house of almost 5,000 fans at Le Colisée, the Colosseum. The World Championship returns, six weeks on from the season opening visit to Barcelona, with back-to-back Rounds in France.

programme.desc: After a torrid few rounds, our drivers' fortunes finally turn as they venture to the BTCC's new circuit...

programme.title: E-Xplorer FIM World Cup
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E02 E-Xplorer FIM World Cup // Oslo, Norway // Episode 2
programme.desc: Bonnell Racing’s Tanja Schlosser and Dylan Woodcock saw off tough competition to win Round 2 of the FIM E-Xplorer World Cup in Oslo.

programme.title: A2RL Explained - Extreme Engineering On Track
programme.desc: We've seen autonomous racing try to take off before, but A2RL, the Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League, is set to push the boundaries of what autonomous racing really can be. We sent Alex Goy over to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to find out what clever tech powers the cars, how they manage to compete in various challengers without a driver (including overtaking, fastest lap and even a man vs machine challenge), and why A2RL is relevant to today's society.

programme.title: Formula Regional Middle East Championship
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E03 Formula Regional Middle East Championship: Round 1: Abu Dhabi - Race 3
programme.desc: Watch the 2024 Formula Regional Middle East Championship third round race one at Yas Marina Circuit, in the United Arab Emirates.

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: X-Trial
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E02 X-Trial: Round 2: Chalon-sur-Saône Extended Highlights
programme.desc: The second staging of X-Trial Chalon-Sur-Saône and the first in two years in front of a packed house of almost 5,000 fans at Le Colisée, the Colosseum. The World Championship returns, six weeks on from the season opening visit to Barcelona, with back-to-back Rounds in France.

programme.title: The F1 Connection
programme.desc: The F1 Connection: News and analysis from the top racing series in the world.

programme.title: Gearing Up
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 Gearing Up: Episode 7: Monster Jam, Stock Car Pro and the Hellas Rally Raid
programme.desc: Welcome to the seventh episode of Gearing Up. It’s the TV series that takes you around the globe following the hottest action from some of the world’s most unique competitions. At their peak, high skills, passion for technology, a relentless drive for innovation, and a pure love for adrenaline come together. So, start your engines, tighten your seat belts, and get ready to feel the G-force with some serious action!

programme.title: Why F1's Madrid 2026 Circuit NEEDS to Avoid Valencia's Failures
programme.desc: F1 has announced that from 2026, the Spanish GP will be held at a brand-new hybrid street circuit in Madrid for 10 years. But having seen Formula 1 previously try to migrate the Spanish GP circuit to Valencia in 2013, which ended up failing entirely, is Madrid's Spanish GP set to fail as well? Or has F1 learnt from history, and will Madrid be a golden race for Spain? And what about the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya's muddy future? Sam Hall and Jon Noble discuss all these points and more.

programme.title: Testing AVL's Groundbreaking Hydrogen Race Engine
programme.desc: We keep hearing about how Hydrogen could possibly be the future of modern race engines, but AVL Racetech is pushing its engineering expertise by building its own H2 Hydrogen Race Engine. We took a trip to their HQ in Graz, Austria, to test their engine on the dyno to see just how much power it can produce, how efficiently it can run, and just how difficult it is to build a Hydrogen engine for race cars.

programme.title: It was 10 Tough Years - Guenther Steiner's Explains his Haas Exit
programme.desc: Following the news that Guenther Steiner has departed Haas following a 10-year partnership with the team, Guenther took to the stage at the Autosport International show to explain his side of the shocking story.

programme.title: 2023 FIA European Rally Trophy: Lausitz-Rallye
programme.desc: Catch up on all of the highlights from the 2023 FIA European Rally Trophy: Lausitz-Rallye.

programme.title: Formula 4 Macau Grand Prix - Race 1
programme.desc: Race 1 from the 2022 Formula 4 Macau GP

programme.title: Porsche Carrera Cup Germany - Hockenheimring: Race 1
programme.desc: Watch the 2023 Porsche Carrera Cup Deutschland first race at Hockenheimring, Germany.

programme.title: Driving La Carrera: Rally Brothers
programme.desc: The world’s greatest auto races fuel every driver’s passion for competition and adventure. But one race offers something more. La Carrera Panamericana unites competitors unlike any other race. This unity is the Spirit of La Carrera. This spirit gave birth to the documentary “Driving La Carrera, Rally Brother.” Two brothers, Chris and Jeff Mason, find out that racing in the Carrera Panamericana is more than just winning.

programme.title: Volkswagen ID.R: Nordschleife Record
programme.desc: Go on a journey with Volkswagen as they aim to break the lap record on the Nordschleife circuit, go behind the scenes with interviews from Hans-Joachim Stuck and Romain Dumas

programme.title: F1 2024's Most Interesting Tech Upgrades So Far
programme.desc: Almost halfway through the 2024 F1 calendar, Formula 1 teams have been busy upgrading their cars, trying to beat Red Bull to the podium's top step. But what are the biggest changes on the grid so far? From Mercedes' novel front wing concept to McLaren's sidepods, Ferrari's engine cover to Red Bull's rear wing, Jake Boxall-Legge channels his inner Bob Ross to illustrate over photos the most interesting and noteworthy upgrades of the season pre-Spanish Grand Prix.

programme.desc: Bei der diesjährigen 21. Auflage der Red Bull Romaniacs werden Teilnehmer aus rund 60 Nationen antreten, darunter die weltbesten Hard-Enduro-Fahrer wie Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Michael Walkner (AUT) und Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: GKA Magazine #1 Freestyle-Kite World Cup
programme.desc: Der Qatar Airways GKA startet in seine neue Saison 2023 mit dem Auftakt in Fuwairit, Katar und dem zweiten Stopp in Salinas Del Rey, Kolumbien. Wir werden einige spektakuläre Wasser-Action mit spektakulären Tricks und unglaublichen Flugzeiten sehen.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: 4Islands MTB Croatia
programme.desc: Das 4Islands MTB Croatia begrüßte über 400 Mountainbiker aus aller Welt zu einem fünftägigen Rennen auf vier kroatischen Inseln. Das Rennen führt über 291 km mit 6150 Höhenmetern und ist einzigartig, da die Fahrer auf dem Deck eines schwimmenden Bootes starten.

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #01
programme.desc: Vodafone Queen & King of the Court wird seine Crown Series 2023 in Miami Beach, Florida, USA, starten. Die größten Stars des Beach-Volleyballs werden vom 9. bis 12. März 2023 anwesend sein.

programme.title: Total Fight 2017 - Ski (AND) & Algarve Challenge - MTB - (POR)
programme.desc: Today on World of Freesports we are going to visit two events. The first takes us to Andorra and the last big competition of the Freestyle Ski community. The battle for the titel of the Total Fight Champion 2017.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2017 - MEN Race Summary
programme.desc: The Cape Epic is the most televised mountain bike stage race in the world and the only 8-day mountain bike stage race classed as hors catégorie by the Union Cycliste Internationale (UCI).

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air World Championships 2022
programme.desc: In todays episode we´re going on another trip with our favorite Kite Sport Athletes. This time we are heading to Tarifa in Spain for the World first Big Air World Championships in several disciplines.

programme.title: King of the Court Crown Series 2022 - Hamburg (GER)
programme.desc: The King of the Court Crown Series 2022 will be unprecedented. Five tournaments, a total of four continents visited and millions of fans from all over the globe that can experience the best beach volleyball action ever seen!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Tignes & Val d’Isère (FRA)
programme.desc: As the second stop of the 2022 E-Bike World Tour, the UCI-accredited E-Tour de Haute-Tarentaise attracted professional and experienced amateur riders from different nations for two days of sublime stage racing across 85km of high alpine terrain.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2022 (ROU)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally was created in 2004 and takes place for the 19th time this year. The race is spread over five days, the first being the inner-city prologue in front of thousands of enthusiastic fans.

programme.title: Episode 38
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 38

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Heroes
programme.desc: The best riders at the best mountains - that´s the Freeride World Tour! We´re going to introduce some of the key players of the tour, from experienced veterans to hungry rookies.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: LAAX Open - Freestyle Dokumentation
programme.desc: It’s a giant amongst giants, the dream combination of Swiss engineering and American craftsmanship and undoubtedly one of the best halfpipes: it’s the legendary Laax superpipe.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: Following the inaugural event at Baqueira Beret (ESP) last weekend, the Freeride World Tour returns to the perennial Pyrenean freeride mecca of Ordino Arcalís, Andorra!

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Morocco
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge entdecken wir die ungezähmte Landschaft und die wunderschöne Wüste von Marokko. Wir machen einen 6-tägigen Mountainbike-Trip durch die spektakulären Sanddünen und werden beim diesjährigen Titan Desert 2023 epische Bike-Action erleben.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria wird auch 2023 wieder die besten Beachtennis-Spieler der Welt mit der Sand Series ITF Beachtennis Gran Canaria empfangen. Der Strand von Las Canteras wird vom 9.-14. Mai den idealen Rahmen für eine Meisterschaft von internationalem Format bieten.

programme.title: GKA Magazine #2 Kite-Surf World Cup
programme.desc: Auf der kapverdischen Insel Sal gibt es eine der besten Wellen der Welt. Ponta Preta erfreut sich perfekter rechtsdrehender Wellen, die sich um die felsige Landzunge winden. Für die Qatar Airways GKA World Tour ist es der ideale Ort, um die Kitesurf-Saison 2023 zu eröffnen.

programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: "Between Home" is an adventure documentary about Nick Jaffe. Nick decides to sail solo from the UK to Australia, negotiating the treacherous waters of the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans.

programme.title: Episode 38
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 38

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival has earned its special place in the heart of the e-bike community thanks to hosting the most iconic e-bike race of them all.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: Profile - Xavier de le Rue (Snowboarding)
programme.desc: The myth - that is Xavier de le Rue will be our guide and will give us a unique chance to experience the mountain from his point of view when serious business starts - so strap yourself in and get ready for this ride!

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Freestyle Kayak
programme.desc: "Go big or go home!" – four athletes in search of the perfect wave. Their quest takes them from Africa to North America. In order to push their sport to its limits!

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #02
programme.desc: Beachvolleyball der WeltklasseZum dritten Mal in Folge ist Hamburg Gastgeber eines Queen & King of the Court-Turniers. Vom 25. bis 28. Mai werden wieder die Besten der Besten in die Hafenstadt an der Elbe reisen, um die Titel der Königinnen und Könige zu erkämpfen.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2023 - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Golden Roof Challenge, Home of the Golden Fly Series, ist eine weltbekannte Stabhochsprung- und Weitsprungsveranstaltung. Sie wird am 7. Juni zum 19. Mal im Herzen von Innsbruck, Österreich, ausgetragen.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Brasilia Classic 2023 (BRA)
programme.desc: Nach einem spannenden Mai, in dem die Sand Series Gran Canaria Classic und die Beach Tennis World Championships in zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Wochen stattfanden, reisen die Spielerinnen nach Brasilien zur dritten Ausgabe der Sand Series Brasilia Classic.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 im italienischen Vieste. Die Windsurfer werden ihr Können auf dem Wasser zeigen und uns ein wenig Wassersport-Action auf dem Mittelmeer bieten.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #1 & #2
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werfen wir einen Blick auf die erste und zweite Runde der World E-Bike Series 2023 in Monaco und Bologna, Italien. Aber wer kann die Rennen der Männer und Frauen gewinnen? Lasst es uns herausfinden!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Mid Season Recap

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Find out as the Miami rap legend takes on the wings of death and discusses everything from partying with Jeremy Shockey to hip-hop's enduring love affair with Benihana.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: O.G. smoker Wiz Khalifa tries to avoid blowing his high on the wings of death. As he and Sean Evans crank up the heat, Wiz breaks down his weed Olympics with Snoop Dogg and discusses his love for the Diplomats.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Anderson discusses opening for Beyonce, defends his Coldplay obsession and gives details on his new Dr. Dre-assisted album, "Oxnard."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: After a life completely devoid of spice, rapper Lil Yachty dives into the hot sauce deep end, trading in his usual meal of pepperoni pizza for ten scorching hot chicken tenders.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Brand is back to brace the heat and discusses his YouTube channel that now has more than 3 million subscribers.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Greatest Band in the World goes wing for wing with Sean Evans. Along they way, the comedic duo discusses everything from Jack's infamous Dorito Burrito to Kanye West to their animated YouTube series.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The "White & Nerdy" icon takes on the vegan wings of death. As the Scovilles mount, Weird Al shares anecdotes about meeting Sir Paul McCartney & Michael Jackson and getting co-signed by Kurt Cobain.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: After reminiscing about the good old days, Desus and Mero go off about everything from Tekashi 69 to avocado-only restaurants to one of the funniest Kanye story you'll ever hear. BX in the building!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Comedy duo Rhett and Link are among the most requested "Hot Ones" guests of all time!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The Rat King takes on the wings of death and chats with Sean Evans as if they were lifelong buddies. Theo talks about climbing Mount Kilimanjaro, capturing chimps in Louisiana and adapting to the L.A. lifestyle.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: As he sweats profusely through the pain, Joey Diaz manages to deliver some incredible anecdotes about getting bitten by dogs and eating edibles with Bert Kreischer's dad.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Comedy legend Artie Lange battles through Zombie Apocalypse and Da' Bomb, cracking jokes about everything from Kanye West to overzealous touchdown dances along the way.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Ace Man looks back on his storied career and battles his way through the wings of death. Along the way, the rant king gets going on everything from Kanye West to iced tea to the brilliance of crows.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Watch Tom Segura reunite with Sean Evans over a brand new hot sauce lineup, discussing everything from Dave Chappelle's surprise special to his beef with pro wrestling and love for Missy Elliott.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Eventually, Segura ends up with tears streaming from his eyes but is it the hot sauce or the tender words from BFF Bert Kreischer? Find out in this scorching new episode of "Hot Ones."

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Sitcom queen Tracee Ellis Ross takes on the wings of death and discusses nights out with Naomi Campbell, the joys of mini bagels and much more.

programme.title: Hot Ones

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Bob Saget became a household name on the classic sitcom Full House as well as a legend on the standup stage.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Pete Holmes is the star & creator of "Crashing" and host of the "You Made It Weird with Pete Holmes" podcast.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Watch as Eric Andre melts down in his own home, chugging milk and screaming non-sequiturs while discussing everything from the genius of Sacha Baron Cohen to his thoughts on comedy skits on classic rap albums.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Through the emotional highs and lows of Zombie Apocalypse and Mad Dog 357, the "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia" star weighs in on everything from Zac Efron's neighborliness to the most iconic regional foods of Rhode Island. Kitten mittens!

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Thomas Middleditch is known for his role on Silicon Valley, but fans know his roots from improv theater.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Kieran Culkin is an Emmy-nominated actor you know as Roman Roy on the riveting HBO drama "Succession."

programme.title: Hot Ones
